languages.text: "Попробуйте, они вам не поверят. Ведь, если вы правы, им придется развязывать войну, убивать меня, заново делить станцию. Зачем им это?" {n}Владайм сухо усмехается вам в лицо.{/n} "Мало сказать людям правду, надо заставить их захотеть поверить в нее".

traits.locale_text: "Попробуйте, они вам не поверят. Ведь, если вы правы, им придется развязывать войну, убивать меня, заново делить станцию. Зачем им это?" {n}Владайм сухо усмехается вам в лицо.{/n} "Мало сказать людям правду, надо заставить их захотеть поверить в нее".

languages.text: "You can try, but they won't believe you. Because if you're right, they'll have to start a war, kill me, divvy up the station again. Why would they want that?" {n}Vladaym chuckles dryly to your face.{/n} "It's not enough to tell people the truth, one must make them want to believe it."
languages.original_text: "Попробуйте, они вам не поверят. Ведь, если вы правы, им придется развязывать войну, убивать меня, заново делить станцию. Зачем им это?" {n}Владайм сухо усмехается вам в лицо.{/n} "Мало сказать людям правду, надо заставить их захотеть поверить в нее".

traits.locale_text: "You can try, but they won't believe you. Because if you're right, they'll have to start a war, kill me, divvy up the station again. Why would they want that?" {n}Vladaym chuckles dryly to your face.{/n} "It's not enough to tell people the truth, one must make them want to believe in it."

"You can try, but they won't believe you. Because if you're right, they'll have to start a war, kill me, divvy up the station again. Why would they want that?" {n}Vladaym chuckles dryly to your face.{/n} "It's not enough to tell people the truth, one must make them want to believe it."

languages.text: 「試してもいいが、きっと信じてもらえまい。もし君が正しいのなら、彼らは戦争を始めて私を殺し、ステーションを再び分割することになるだろう。なぜそれを望むだろうか？」{n}ヴラダイムはこちらに乾いた笑みを投げた。{/n}「民に真実を伝えればそれでヨシとはいかないのだ。信じたくなる事でなければならない」
languages.original_text: "You can try, but they won't believe you. Because if you're right, they'll have to start a war, kill me, divvy up the station again. Why would they want that?" {n}Vladaym chuckles dryly to your face.{/n} "It's not enough to tell people the truth, one must make them want to believe it."

traits.locale_text: 「試してもいいが、きっと信じてもらえまい。もし君が正しいのなら、彼らは戦争を始めて私を殺し、ステーションを再び分割することになるだろう。なぜそれを望むだろうか？」{n}ヴラダイムはこちらに乾いた笑みを投げた。{/n}「民に真実を伝えればそれでヨシとはいかないのだ。信じたくなる事でなければならない」

languages.text: “您大可以试试，但他们是不会相信您的。因为如果您说的是实话，他们就会向我宣战，杀了我，重新瓜分落脚港，但他们为什么要这么做呢？”{n}弗拉迪姆看着你，发出了干笑。{/n}“仅仅告诉人们真相是不够的，还必须让他们愿意相信。”
languages.original_text: "You can try, but they won't believe you. Because if you're right, they'll have to start a war, kill me, divvy up the station again. Why would they want that?" {n}Vladaym chuckles dryly to your face.{/n} "It's not enough to tell people the truth, one must make them want to believe it."

traits.locale_text: “您大可以试试，但他们是不会相信您的。因为如果您说的是实话，他们就会向我宣战，杀了我，重新瓜分落脚港，但他们为什么要这么做呢？”{n}弗拉迪姆看着你，发出了干笑。{/n}“仅仅告诉人们真相是不够的，还必须让他们愿意相信。”

languages.text: «Puede intentarlo, otra cosa es que {mf|le|la} crean. Si está usted en lo cierto, tendrían que empezar una guerra, matarme y volver a dividirse la estación. ¿Quién en su sano juicio querría eso?». {n}Vladaym se ríe secamente en tu cara.{/n} «No basta con decir la verdad a la gente; se la tienen que creer».
languages.original_text: "You can try, but they won't believe you. Because if you're right, they'll have to start a war, kill me, divvy up the station again. Why would they want that?" {n}Vladaym chuckles dryly to your face.{/n} "It's not enough to tell people the truth, one must make them want to believe it."

traits.locale_text: «Puede intentarlo, otra cosa es que {mf|le|la} crean. Si está usted en lo cierto, tendrían que empezar una guerra, matarme y volver a dividirse la estación. ¿Quién en su sano juicio querría eso?». {n}Vladaym se ríe secamente en tu cara.{/n} «No basta con decir la verdad a la gente; se la tienen que creer».

languages.text: « Vous pouvez toujours essayer, mais personne ne vous croira. Parce que si vous disiez vrai, ils devraient repartir en guerre, me tuer et diviser à nouveau la station. Pourquoi iraient-ils faire ça ? {n}demande-t-il, puis il vous rit sèchement au visage.{/n} C'est bien beau de dire la vérité, mais encore faut-il que les gens aient envie d'y croire. »
languages.original_text: "You can try, but they won't believe you. Because if you're right, they'll have to start a war, kill me, divvy up the station again. Why would they want that?" {n}Vladaym chuckles dryly to your face.{/n} "It's not enough to tell people the truth, one must make them want to believe it."

traits.locale_text: « Vous pouvez toujours essayer, mais personne ne vous croira. Parce que si vous disiez vrai, ils devraient repartir en guerre, me tuer et diviser à nouveau la station. Pourquoi iraient-ils faire ça ? {n}demande-t-il, puis il vous rit sèchement au visage.{/n} C'est bien beau de dire la vérité, mais encore faut-il que les gens aient envie d'y croire. »

languages.text: "Ihr könnt es versuchen, aber sie werden Euch nicht glauben. Denn wenn Ihr recht hättet, müssten sie einen Krieg beginnen, mich töten und die Station erneut aufteilen. Warum sollten sie das wollen?" {n}Vladaym grinst dich ungerührt an.{/n} "Es reicht nicht aus, Menschen die Wahrheit zu sagen, sie müssen sie auch glauben wollen."
languages.original_text: "You can try, but they won't believe you. Because if you're right, they'll have to start a war, kill me, divvy up the station again. Why would they want that?" {n}Vladaym chuckles dryly to your face.{/n} "It's not enough to tell people the truth, one must make them want to believe it."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr könnt es versuchen, aber sie werden Euch nicht glauben. Denn wenn Ihr recht hättet, müssten sie einen Krieg beginnen, mich töten und die Station erneut aufteilen. Warum sollten sie das wollen?" {n}Vladaym grinst dich ungerührt an.{/n} "Es reicht nicht aus, Menschen die Wahrheit zu sagen, sie müssen sie auch glauben wollen."

languages.text: "Buyurun deneyin ama inanmazlar. Zira haklıysanız savaş başlatmaları, beni öldürmeleri ve istasyonu tekrar bölmeleri gerekecek. Neden böyle bir şey istesinler ki?" {n}Vladaym, yüzüne karşı kuru kuru gülüyor.{/n} "İnsanlara hakikati anlatmak yetmez, inanmak istemelerini sağlamak gerekir."
languages.original_text: "You can try, but they won't believe you. Because if you're right, they'll have to start a war, kill me, divvy up the station again. Why would they want that?" {n}Vladaym chuckles dryly to your face.{/n} "It's not enough to tell people the truth, one must make them want to believe it."

traits.locale_text: "İsterseniz deneyin ama inanmazlar. Zira haklıysanız savaş başlatmaları, beni öldürmeleri ve istasyonu tekrar bölmeleri gerekecek. Neden böyle bir şey istesinler ki?" {n}Vladaym, yüzüne karşı ilgisizce kıkırdıyor.{/n} "İnsanlara hakikati anlatmak yeterli gelmez, inanmak istemelerini sağlamalıyız."
